In header of reports - location the report was run from
In header of reports - time/date report was run
In header of reports - description of report filters

In footer of reports - indicates that report was limited by the choice on the option page. Param is an integer number
translation.variant: Report content limited to {0} rows. Raise this limit on the Options tab to see more rows.

translation.note: This message appears in reports if they result in no data
translation.variant: No results found using the current options

translation.note: Used on schedule instance and security assignement reports to show where an ignore above transition is. This indicates that hierarchical information from above this location in the tree will not propagate below this point.
Footer for PDF reports. Param 0 is the current page number. This must be layed out so that the total number of pages will occur after this string.
Informs user that the file was not created by the correct version of ViewBuilder.
translation.variant: Unable to display graphic file because it is not valid. It was either created by an incorrect version of ViewBuilder or edited outside of ViewBuilder.

translation.note: Short text for a system alarm that is generated (for iVu Plus) when the system has excessive historical trends
translation.variant: The system has excessive number of historical trend samples

translation.note: Long text for a system alarm that is generated (for iVu Plus) when the system has excessive historical trends
translation.variant: Please reduce the number of trend samples that are historically stored. Otherwise, the system performance will degrade over time

translation.note: Short text for a system alarm that is generated (for iVu Plus) when the size of system datafiles exceed the expected limits
translation.variant: The size of system database files exceed the expected limits

translation.note: Long text for a system alarm that is generated (for iVu Plus) when the size of system datafiles exceed the expected limits
translation.variant: Please compact the system databases using the Management Tool. Otherwise, the system performance will degrade over time

translation.note: shown when a function is invoked that is not allowed while time machine is active
translation.variant: Not allowed while viewing the timeline.
